'''Haxorus''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''オノノクス''' ''Ononokus'') is a {{type|Dragon}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] from {{p|Fraxure}} starting at [[level]] 48. It is the final form of {{p|Axew}}.

==Biology==
Haxorus is a bipedal Pokémon with a dark yellow-green covering on its back and most of the front. It has black skin covering its torso, tail tip, and thighs, as well as red talons and claws. Its large tusks, which resemble scythes, are black and edged in red, and are located on its upper jaw on the side of its mouth. These tusks, which can cut steel beams, are unbreakable. Its medium-sized eyes are red with black pupils. Ridged plate-like skin travels from its back to its head region. It has solid armor and the legs and tail have a dividing line pattern. Its arms are quite small, with three digits with two elliptical triceps and biceps and circular elbows. Its hands are small and circular with small red claws. Its legs are formidable and strong with three toed feet with a red talon on each toe. It is generally friendly, but it is very territorial.

==In the anime==
===In the main series===
[[File:Rhoder Haxorus.png|thumb|left|250px|Haxorus in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
====Major appearances====
[[Drayden]]'s Haxorus debuted in ''[[BW033|Iris and Excadrill Against the Dragon Buster!]]'' in a flashback, where it was shown defeating [[Iris's Excadrill]] in a battle. This led to Iris having trouble with Excadrill. Drayden's Haxorus later physically appeared in ''[[BW101|Drayden Versus Iris: Past, Present, and Future!]]'', where it had another battle against Excadrill, which resulted in a tie.

A Haxorus appeared in ''[[BW100|A Village Homecoming!]]'', where it was noticed by [[Iris's Dragonite]] and had a fight with it.

A Haxorus appeared in ''[[BW117|Team Plasma's Pokémon Manipulation!]]'', under the ownership of [[Rhoder]]. It caused a rampage in the city due to it being under the control of [[Colress]]'s machines at the time. Haxorus returned to normal when one of the machines was destroyed by [[Aldith]]'s {{p|Liepard}}'s {{m|Shadow Ball}}.

====Minor appearances====
Haxorus debuted in ''[[BW006|Dreams by the Yard Full!]]'' in {{TP|Iris|Axew}}'s dream, where it first evolved into {{p|Fraxure}} and then into the Axe Jaw Pokémon.

A Haxorus appeared in {{an|Iris}}'s fantasy in ''[[BW009|The Bloom Is on Axew!]]''.

==Trivia==
===Origin===
Haxorus's tusks resemble that of ''{{wp|Scutosaurus}}'' or a {{wp|ceratopsia}}n, and are also similar to {{wp|battle axe}} blades.

====Name origin====
Haxorus is a combination of ''hack'' (to chop or cut down), ''axe'', and σαῦρος ''saurus'' (Greek for ''lizard'').

Ononokus may be a combination of 斧 ''ono'' (axe), 戦く ''ononoku'' (to tremble), and アックス ''akkusu'' (axe).
